disaster_recovery_plan.title: Disaster Recovery Plan
disaster_recovery_plan.description: This is a disaster recovery plan for [Company Name].
goals_and_objectives: To ensure business continuity during a disaster.
To minimize the impact of a disaster on the company's operations.

procedures.title: Backup and Recovery Procedures
procedures.description: This procedure outlines the steps to be taken to backup and recover data and systems in the event of a disaster.
steps: Create regular backups of critical data and systems.
Store backups in a secure location off-site.
Test the backup and recovery procedures regularly.
Verify the integrity of backups before restoring them.

procedures.title: Incident Response Procedures
procedures.description: This procedure outlines the steps to be taken in the event of a disaster.
steps: Assess the situation and determine the extent of the damage.
Communicate with stakeholders about the incident.

IT Manager: Coordinating the implementation and testing of the DRP.
Reviewing and updating the DRP on a regular basis.
System Administrator: Maintaining and updating the IT infrastructure.
Implementing and testing the DRP procedures.
Providing technical support during a disaster.

evaluation_criteria: Time taken to restore critical systems
Effectiveness of communication during the test
